data.name: Curcumin/Turmeric
data.status:
Powder or granular. Mushbooh if used as liquid, 
the solvents has to be Halal. Haraam if hidden 
ingredient is pork fat based emulsifier in dry mix.

data.name: Riboflavin (Vitamin B2)
data.status:
Mushbooh  (Haraam if from pork liver & Kidney, 
Halal if 100% plant material)

data.name: Tartrazine
data.status:
Halal if used as 100% dry color. 
Mushbooh if used as liquid color, 
the solvent has to be Halal

data.name: Sunset Yellow FCF / Orange Yellow S
data.status:
Halal if used as 100% dry color. 
Mushbooh if used as liquid color, 
the solvent has to be Halal

data.name: Cochineal / Carminic Acid

Halal if used as 100% dry color.

Halal if use as is as a 100% synthetic color  but if pork

data.name: Beta-apo-8-carotenal
data.status:
Halal if used as 100% dry powder or granular or

hidden ingredient or carrier

data.name: Ethyl ester of Beta-apo-8-cartonoic acid

Halal if used as 100% dry powder or granular or

hidden ingredient or carrier

data.status:
Halal if saturated  fatty acid Palmitic acid is obtained from plant. 
Haraam if palmitic acid is obtained from pork fat

data.name: Natural Extracts rich in Tocopherols
data.status:
Halal If Tocopherol is obtained from plant fat. 
Haraam if Tocopherol is obtained from pork fat

data.name: Synthetic Alpha-Tocopherol
data.status:
Halal only if it is made with all Halal synthetic 
material without alcoholic fermentation synthetic method

data.name: Synthetic Gamma-Tocopherol
data.status:
Halal only if it is made with all Halal synthetic 
material without alcoholic fermentation synthetic method

data.status:

Haraam if alcohol was used as solvent

data.name: Butylated Hydroxyanisole (BHA)
data.status:
Halal if only vegetable oil is used as a carrier. 
Haraam if the carrier is from pork fat. 
It is not available as pure 100% chemical.

data.name: Butylated Hydroxytoluene (BHT)
data.status:
Halal if only vegetable oil is used as a carrier. 
Haraam if the carrier is from pork fat. 
It is not available as pure 100% chemical.

data.name: Lecithin
data.status:
Halal if obtained from soy fat or egg yolk in Europe. 
It is Halal in USA because it is always obtained from soy fat.
